subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: As the Nascar Nextel Cup regular-season draws closer to completion, Kasey Kahne, 11th in points, is not letting up on the gas pedal or the pressure.
snippet: As the Nascar Nextel Cup regular-season draws closer to completion, Kasey Kahne, 11th in points, is not letting up on the gas pedal or the pressure.
